segments.text: Excuse me , but is this dress on sale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The dress was on sale yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure ? I'd be happy to pay the sale price today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so sorry , but rules are rules .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll just check out a few other stores .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry I couldn't help you .
segments.speaker: S2
